messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: Alan Hilliar says... 'We need to honestly trust our MP again. To be able to work with everybody and fairness for everyone in their constituency. If you elect me to Parliament, I'll put your voice into action by efforts and works for a future for all in Surrey Heath!'

messages.title: Key Tory MPs call to dismantle NHS

keyPolicies.policyTitle: OUR NHS: At risk with the Conservatives
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats will restore the NHS to full health. The NHS is a vital service that must be preserved, in contrast to the Conservative plans.

issues.health: OUR NHS: At risk with the Conservatives - Alan Hilliar says the NHS has been put in danger under the Conservatives, and Liberal Democrats pledge to restore it.

leaflet.personalStatement: Alan Hilliar talks about the need to trust our MP again and to provide fairness and representation for everyone in their constituency.

quotes.text: Tory Health spokesman accepted Â£21,000 donation from private health firm boss
'David Cameron was NHS privatisation campaigners' pin-up'
'We've lived this mistake for 60 years now... The reality is [the NHS] hasn't worked - it has made people iller...'
quotes.source: Steve Hilton, David Cameron's Chief Strategist, 2002

images.caption: Alan Hilliar interacting with a member of the public

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet contains a comparison of policies and viewpoints between Liberal Democrats and Conservatives, with an emphasis on the importance of the NHS and a warning against Conservative policies.
